name: list_reminders
description: Lists all active reminders for the user, sorted by scheduled time. Shows reminder title, scheduled time, type (SMS/email/Slack), and recurrence pattern if any. Use this when the user asks 'what reminders do I have?' or wants to see their upcoming reminders.

limit.description: Maximum number of reminders to return (default: 20)

include_completed.description: Whether to include completed reminders (default: false)
